title: Watch VA, NJ, CA now for clues to the midterms and 2028. (Maybe.)
shortDescription: There's a reason the political world is obsessed with the Nov. 4 gubernatorial races in Virginia and New Jersey: They're the only ones we've got.

title: NYC voters hit polls early
shortDescription: Early voting is underway in New York City as residents choose their next mayor.

title: 'More than the National Guard.' Trump warns of deploying more troops
shortDescription: Trump warned in a speech in Japan that he could send 'more than the National Guard' to quell what he contends is rampant violence in US cities.

title: Trump visits US troops in Japan
shortDescription: President Donald Trump praised Japan’s first female prime minister during his trip. The leaders signed a minerals deal and spoke to troops.

title: Leader of local GOP in Kentucky apologizes for sharing racist video depicting Obamas
shortDescription: The Kentucky Republican Party said it is investigating the matter "and will take the harshest action available to us against those involved."

title: A strong handshake and another Nobel Prize nod for Trump in Japan
shortDescription: Trump's visit to Japan to meet the new prime minister gave him another supporter for the Nobel Peace Prize.

title: Trump's Chicago crackdown boss to appear in court amid questions
shortDescription: Judge Sara L. Ellis is ordering top Border Patrol official Gregory Bovino to testify after a video showed him apparently violating her orders.

title: Democrats invite states to apply on who goes first in 2028 primaries
shortDescription: States that want to be part of Democrats' early voting window must submit their plans to the Rules and Bylaws Committee by Jan. 16, 2026.

title: Trump's World Series post is fake. His real issue with Canada and LA
shortDescription: Did President Donald Trump really say the baseball World Series winners wouldn't be allowed to come to the White House? No, that tweet is fake.

title: Trump rules out running in 2028 as VP, calling it 'too cute'
shortDescription: The Constitution limits presidents to two terms but Trump has toyed with the idea of a third, raising the topic during public events.

title: Florida Gov. DeSantis talks property taxes
shortDescription: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis has expressed interest in cutting property taxes, but said he's limited by the state Constitution.

title: Indiana joins GOP push to redraw congressional maps
shortDescription: Indiana Gov. Mike Braun has called a special session to redraw the state’s congressional maps mid-decade, as requested by the Trump administration.

title: Trump received MRI scan during health exam at Walter Reed
shortDescription: Trump didn't say why he underwent an MRI, referring questions to his doctors.

title: Trump received MRI at Walter Reed 'semi-annual physical' this month
shortDescription: President Donald Trump speaking with reporters on Air Force One on his way to Japan revealed he received an MRI at Walter Reed earlier this month.

title: Trump says he underwent an MRI examination with 'perfect' results
shortDescription:
U.S. President Donald Trump said on Monday he had undergone an MRI examination, without saying why.
"It was perfect," he told reporters on board Air Force One en route to Tokyo.

title: Trump doesn't rule out 2028 run
shortDescription: Donald Trump said he would "love to do it" when asked if he would consider running for a third term in office in 2028.

title: Government shutdown hits day 27 as Trump in Asia
shortDescription: The government shutdown is just days away from the one-month mark. With the president abroad, no major breakthroughs in Congress are expected.

title: Daily Briefing: The Democrats' new formula
shortDescription: Two moderate women could model Democrats' next phase. Here is the news to know on Monday.

title: 'Harsh terrain': Inside Columbia's First Amendment debates
shortDescription: Though they're navigating uncharted waters, one dean said "we haven't fundamentally changed anything about how we go about our responsibility."
